1552994800_1Gn3VCPeEdJaKUhFQKaJzS8DmdqnC.body: You have to force TOR connection in ZeroNet settings.

Tor
Disable: Don't connect to peers on Tor network
Enable: Only use Tor for Tor network peers
--> Always: Use Tor for every connections to hide your IP address (slower)
